title: U.S. Pulls Diplomats From Sudan, and an Exodus Begins
description: With hopes fading that two warring generals will end their battle anytime soon, diplomats and other foreigners began heading for Sudan’s doors.

title: Russia’s Wagner Group Has Offered Weapons to R.S.F., U.S. Says
description: Wagner has offered powerful weapons, including surface-to-air missiles, to R.S.F. paramilitaries, American officials said.

title: Your Monday Briefing: Evacuations from Sudan
Bruce Haigh, Diplomat Who Helped Battle Apartheid, Dies at 77
description: An Australian, he assisted South African dissidents like the journalist Donald Woods, whose story was told in the movie “Cry Freedom.”

title: Political Chaos Unsettles Israel as It Looks to Honor the Fallen and Its Independence
description: Israelis are bracing for a tense Memorial Day and the 75th anniversary of their country’s founding as a political crisis tears it apart.

title: Barlocco Island in Scotland Listed for $180,000
description: Reaching Barlocco Island is challenging, and staying there for any length of time even more so. Still, dozens are vying for the 25 acres of nature.

title: Baseball Has Changed
description: One month into the baseball season, new rules have already had an impact on the game.

title: Russia Pounds Cities Across the Country, Ukraine Says
description: Russian forces hit Ukrainian cities with missiles, mortars, artillery and airstrikes over the weekend, Ukrainian officials said.

title: High-Ranking Election Official Is Killed in Myanmar
description: A rebel group has claimed responsibility for the attack on an official for the military junta, which comes amid cascading violence on both sides.

title: Chinese Censorship Is Quietly Rewriting the Covid-19 Story
description: Under government pressure, Chinese scientists have retracted studies and withheld or deleted data. The censorship has stymied efforts to understand the virus.

title: Under Russian Fire, a Ukrainian Soldier Evacuates the Wounded
description: Valentyn is a Ukrainian soldier tasked with moving injured troops — and dead bodies — away from the front lines. He described the relentless work of responding to casualties under fire.

title: ‘I Cry Quietly’: A Soldier Describes the Toll of Russia’s War
description: For Valentyn, a Ukrainian soldier in the Donetsk region, the war’s death toll is more than a statistic. He is tasked with moving wounded troops — and dead bodies — away from the front lines, often under Russian fire.

title: U.S. Evacuates Embassy in Sudan
description: President Biden announced the rescue mission as fighting in the capital, Khartoum, stretched into a second week.

title: Leonardo’s Ferry Left High and Dry by Global Warming and Red Tape
description: A ferry used to traverse the banks of the Adda River, in northern Italy, but drought and an abundance of bureaucracy has closed it down.
